Project Description
WPF testing ground for development of a "floating" listviewitem (preeettty)

The aim of this project is to find out the best way to "float" a ListViewItem from one ListView to another. The code is purely for test purposes and allowing people on stackoverflow to access the code (as well as acquaint me with using CodePlex.

I will also upload examples of the behavior I am trying to accomplish when I get the chance
